name: Black Cat Pirates

keyMoments.title: Black Cat Pirates Revealed
keyMoments.description: The Black Cat Pirates are revealed to still be active, with Kuro as their captain despite the world believing he died three years ago. Jango serves as his first mate.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes the Black Cat Pirates as the main antagonist crew of the Syrup Village arc. They are preparing to attack the village as part of Kuro's plan.

keyMoments.title: Kuro's Fake Death Scheme
keyMoments.description: It's revealed that Kuro faked his death three years ago by hypnotizing one of his crew members to believe he was Captain Kuro, then sent this lookalike to the Marines for execution.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Kuro's ruthlessness toward his own crew and explains how the Black Cat Pirates continued to exist despite their captain's supposed death.

keyMoments.title: Black Cat Pirates Positioned for Attack
keyMoments.description: Jango reports that the Black Cat Pirates' ship is stationed at the northern shore of Syrup Village, ready to launch their attack when ordered by Kuro.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes the immediate threat to Syrup Village. The crew is in position and ready to execute Kuro's plan to massacre the village and kill Kaya.

goals.description: The Black Cat Pirates are positioned to attack Syrup Village as part of Kuro's scheme to kill Kaya and inherit her fortune. The raid will serve as cover for the assassination.
Part of Kuro's plan involves having the Black Cat Pirates massacre the villagers to leave no witnesses to Kaya's murder.

ship: Bezan Black (crew ship stationed at northern shore)
totalMembers: Unknown number of crew members (full crew not yet shown)

keyMoments.title: Crew Seeks Ship from Klahadore
keyMoments.description: The Straw Hat crew approaches Klahadore to request a ship for their journey, but he coldly rejects them and expels them from the mansion.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the crew working together to achieve their goal of obtaining a ship, which remains unfulfilled at this point.

keyMoments.title: Luffy Discovers Enemy Plot
keyMoments.description: Luffy (along with Usopp) discovers Kuro's conspiracy to assassinate Kaya, giving the crew crucial intelligence about the threat.
keyMoments.significance: The crew now has a mission to protect Kaya and stop the Black Cat Pirates' attack on Syrup Village.

keyMoments.title: Yasopp's Role Confirmed
keyMoments.description: Luffy confirms to Usopp that his father Yasopp is a member of Shanks' Red Hair Pirates and that Yasopp often talks proudly about his son to the crew.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes the connection between Usopp and the Red Hair Pirates through his father, linking two major storylines of the series.
